title: 机翻和人工的区别
author: xiaopangju
txt_content:
本帖最后由 冰川橘子 于 2019-7-6 18:32 编辑 

机翻：Long, long ago, there was a plate in mcbbs called Miner's Teahouse, where there was a moderator named Jiuyou Emperor. But Jiuyou left because he couldn't stand the pressure and was completely disappointed with the plate.
人工（我）：Long long ago,there was a where.It name was kuanggongchuanguan.A moderator's name is jiuyouzhidi.This where let jiuyou sad ,so JIUYOU is go away.jiuyouzhidi always in here,but was not a moderator.（一定有非常多语法错误）
Li Hua walk lu shang ,bei car zhuang,120 wuwawuwa came




*O_20190706_183227.jpg (103.24 KB, 下载次数: 0)
